txt.en: 'Well met again, [placeholder]. There is a new chef in Umbar, and he has been entertaining all of Umbar with his delicious crab creations. Now Umbar is running low on crab-meat! This may not seem like an emergency, but I can assure you it is. There are bountiful supplies of crabs on Zamarzîr in the Shield Isles, but large ferocious crabs have been sabotaging our traps and fighting off the workers. Please, aid the harvest on Zamarzîr in the Shield Isles.'
You have successfully harvested the crabs and defeated the greater cast-mother! Return with the Umbari scout to the mission giver with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to aid in harvesting crabs in Zamarzîr and to fight off any crabs or beasts that get in your way.
'Thank you for this. It may seem silly, but it's the little things that keep us going, our hearts strong and our will determined...\n\n'And I just love crab.'
'Your mission is clear, [placeholder], to aid in harvesting the crabs in Zamarzîr and to fight off any crabs or beasts that get in your way.'
Complete Mission: A Taste for Crab
Your mission is to aid in harvesting crabs in Zamarzîr and to fight off any crabs or beasts that get in your way.\n\nSpeak to Malthak to travel.
